update zj_xm_salary_user_extension set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and extension_id in
#{model.extensionId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t_user.*, (SELECT t_tech.title FROM zj_xm_salary_professional_technology t_tech WHERE t_tech.del_flag = '0' AND t_tech.extension_id = t_user.extension_id ORDER BY t_tech.create_time DESC LIMIT 1) AS title, (SELECT t_cert.certificate_name FROM zj_xm_salary_certificate_management t_cert WHERE t_cert.del_flag = '0' AND t_cert.extension_id = t_user.extension_id AND t_cert.certificate_type = '2' ORDER BY t_cert.create_time DESC LIMIT 1) AS certificateName,
(SELECT t_work.position FROM zj_xm_salary_work_experience t_work WHERE t_work.del_flag = '0' AND t_work.extension_id = t_user.extension_id ORDER BY t_work.create_time DESC LIMIT 1) AS experiencePosition,
(SELECT department_name FROM sys_department t_dept WHERE t_dept.del_flag = '0' AND t_dept.department_id = t_user.project_id) as projectName,
(SELECT department_name FROM sys_department t_dept WHERE t_dept.del_flag = '0' AND t_dept.department_id = t_user.office_id) as officeName, (SELECT department_name FROM sys_department t_dept WHERE t_dept.del_flag = '0' AND t_dept.department_id = t_user.wage_of_project_id) as wageProjectName from zj_xm_salary_user_extension AS t_user
where t_user.extension_id = #{extensionId,jdbcType=CHAR}
